content: सामयिक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (की|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [समय-ठञ्] {@--1@} Customary, conventional. {@--2@} Agreed upon, stipulated. {@--3@} Conforming to agreement, keeping an appointment or engagement; देवि सामयिका भवामः <ls>M. 1.</ls> {@--4@} Punctual, exact. {@--5@} Reasonable, timely; <ls>Ki. 2. 40.</ls> {@--6@} Periodical. {@--7@} Temporary.
